fixtures.description: Supported conic-gradient should paint deterministic quadrant colors without fallback diagnostics.
border-left-color should override the left edge color while preserving other border edges from shorthand.
Uniform border paint should surround the background fill with deterministic edge colors.
Negative spread should shrink the painted shadow geometry instead of being clamped away.
Custom-property calc additive expressions should resolve through pending var paths with mixed units.
Pending var length resolution should handle calc(var(--x) * 1%) and produce percent widths.
Custom property fallback chain should resolve to nested fallback value.
Length custom properties should resolve through var chains and var fallbacks for box sizing.
Custom-property length math functions should resolve through var() into deterministic widths.
Malformed conic-gradient without fallback color should deterministically no-op paint and emit known-loss diagnostics.
Malformed conic-gradient should emit deterministic known-loss diagnostics while preserving fallback color paint.
Unsupported filters/effects/compositing declarations should keep deterministic paint and emit explicit known-loss diagnostics.
Multi-column properties should deterministically degrade to single-column layout with explicit known-loss diagnostics.
Debug diagnostics should report unsupported media evaluation and parsed-no-effect declarations.
align-content:flex-end should pack wrapped flex lines at the cross-axis end.
align-self should override container align-items for individual flex items.
flex-flow: row wrap should enable wrapping and preserve deterministic flex row ordering.
place-content:flex-end center should map to align-content and justify-content for wrapped flex rows.
place-items should map to align-items semantics for flex container cross-axis alignment.
place-self should map to align-self semantics for item-level flex cross-axis override.
Flex row with two equal flex items should distribute space evenly left/right.
break-inside:avoid on a block should move the block to the next page when it does not fit remaining space.
Long paragraph should fragment across multiple pages in deterministic page count.
Row/column gap var evaluation should resolve deterministic gap spacing in computed style and paint.
When multiple grid items target the same explicit start slot, deterministic fallback should place later items into the next free slot.
Grid item row/column start properties should deterministically place an item into the target cell while preserving auto placement for others.
Grid containers with only grid-template-rows should deterministically derive column count from row count and child cardinality.
Grid container with explicit column/row tracks should lay out four fixed-size cells in a deterministic 2x2 matrix.
Unset should reset non-inherited properties to initial values in deterministic layout/paint.
Inset left var should resolve in computed style for positioned elements.
inline-size/block-size should resolve through width/height baseline mapping in horizontal-tb LTR.
Logical inset properties should map to physical offsets in horizontal-tb LTR.
Logical margin/padding properties should map to physical edges in horizontal-tb LTR.
overflow:hidden should clip absolute child paint to the host border box.
overflow:visible should allow absolute child paint to bleed outside the host border box.
page-break-before:always on a later block should force deterministic pagination even when remaining page space exists.
Absolute with auto insets should fall back to static-position flow slot instead of containing-block origin.
Absolutely positioned empty box should still paint its sized background.
Absolute positioned elements with explicit width should overflow their containing block without width clamping.
Absolute child under static parent should fall back to initial containing block, not parent padding box.
Absolute positioning with left+right+explicit width should keep explicit width and anchor from left.
Absolute element should use the nearest positioned ancestor as its containing block across static intermediates.
Absolute percentage insets should resolve against the nearest positioned ancestor, not a static intermediary.
Root-level absolute underlay (z-index:-1) should paint on page one only and not repeat on subsequent pages.
Root-level absolute overlays should paint on page one only and not repeat on subsequent pages.
Equal-specificity source order should deterministically resolve root absolute background and z-index before overlay composition.
Higher-specificity id selector should win root absolute z-index/background over later class selector.
Root-level absolute boxes should honor z-index ordering and paint above in-flow content for z-index >= 0.
Absolute positioning with top+bottom+explicit height should keep explicit height and anchor from top.
transform should establish a containing block for absolute descendants even when position is static.
position:fixed with negative z-index should paint beneath normal-flow page content on each page.
position:fixed should render on every paginated page at viewport-relative coordinates.
Fixed overlays with higher z-index should paint above lower fixed overlays in deterministic order.
position:relative bottom:calc(25% + 0.25in) should resolve against fixed containing block height.
position:relative left:calc(25% + 0.5in) should resolve against containing block width.
position:relative right:calc(25% + 0.5in) should resolve against containing block width.
position:relative inset shorthand should map to top/right/bottom/left offsets.
position:relative with both left and right should use left precedence for deterministic offset.
position:relative offsets should shift paint while preserving normal flow space.
position:relative left percentage should resolve against containing block width.
position:relative top percentage should resolve against fixed containing block height.
position:relative right/bottom should shift paint left/up while preserving flow slot.
position:relative with both top and bottom should use top precedence for deterministic offset.
Attribute selector operators should match deterministically, with equal-specificity source-order tie breaks.
Adjacent and general sibling combinators should target deterministic sibling rows.
Selector specificity check: id selector should override class selector for background color.
Structural pseudo-classes should resolve deterministically across sibling rows.
Single-page paint/layout baseline with deterministic section background color.
Table header row should repeat on each fragmented page in deterministic table pagination.

checks.node: html:nth-child(1) > body:nth-child(2) > table.t:nth-child(1) > thead:nth-child(1) > tr:nth-child(1) > th:nth-child(1)

fixtures.description: Individual transform properties should compose with transform in deterministic order.
transform: matrix should execute as first-class affine transform in compute and paint.
transform-origin should anchor scale around the left edge instead of the default center.
transform: rotate should evaluate through compute and paint around default center origin.
rotate: var(--missing, 90deg) should resolve fallback angle through compute and paint.
rotate: var(--r) should resolve custom-property angles through compute and paint.
transform: scaleX should evaluate through compute and paint, shrinking around default center origin.
scale: var(--s) should resolve custom-property scale pairs through compute and paint.
transform: skewX should shear paint geometry with deterministic left-top origin anchoring.
transform: translateX should shift paint output while preserving deterministic layout flow.
translate: var(--t) should resolve custom-property translate pairs through compute and paint.
transform: var(--a, translateX(1in)) should use fallback when custom property cycle is detected.
transform: var(--x) should resolve custom-property transform lists through compute and paint.
Two-page break behavior with distinct page backgrounds for paint and pagination checks.
Calc expression should resolve deterministic absolute width for layout and paint.
Min/max/clamp expressions should resolve deterministic widths for stacked bars.
